pr_title: Fixed bug where BlobInputStream would not etag lock

timeline.message: Fixed bug where BlobInputStream would not etag lock

timeline.bodyText: I think we should also check that there aren't existing etag conditions. If they pass in an old etag that they want to target, and we just got a new one possibly after some updates, we might not be reading the version they requested.
